definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: Kneading dough by hand until the non-stick hand up.
sentences.chinese: 用手揉面团，直到不粘手为止。

sentences.english: I entertained myself flicking wheat-based projectiles at the cat.
sentences.chinese: 我把小面团当成子弹弹向那只猫，以此来打发时间。

sentences.english: Wrap the ball of dough with greaseproof wrapper and chill it for 30 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把和好的面团用保鲜膜包好，放入冰箱松弛30分钟。

sentences.english: Cover, and let rise until doubled in size, about 45 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 盖上湿布进行基本发酵至面团两倍大，大约45分钟。

sentences.english: The doughboy was a predecessor of the doughnut.
sentences.chinese: 油炸面团是甜甜圈的前身。

sentences.english: There is a positive correlativity of the content of wet gluten and stable time of dough to the yield.
sentences.chinese: 湿面筋含量和面团稳定时间与强筋小麦产量呈正相关。

sentences.english: A thin, crisp wafer or biscuit, usually made of unsweetened dough.
sentences.chinese: 一种通常由不含糖的生面团做成的薄脆饼干。

sentences.english: The deer dined on dough, though the doe dined on dates.
sentences.chinese: 鹿没有吃生面团，尽管母鹿吃了枣椰子。

sentences.english: Stir in sugar and egg yolk to form a dough, chill for 15 mintues.
sentences.chinese: 拌入糖和蛋黄揉成光滑的面团，放入冰箱15分钟。

sentences.english: Form the dough into a ball with your hands.
She used a rolling pin to flatten the pie dough .
sentences.chinese: 她用擀面棍来擀平做馅饼的面团。

sentences.english: For another thing, using the rolling pin make the dough round and thin.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，用擀面棍把面团擀成圆的薄饼。

sentences.english: The dough is so wet that it won't roll.
L-ascorbic acid, trehalose, and glutin can significantly increase the Tg of wheat dough.
sentences.chinese: 食品添加剂对面团的玻璃化转变温度有显著影响。

sentences.english: These men have been the leaven in the lump of the race.
sentences.chinese: 如果说这个种族是块面团，这些人便是发酵剂。

sentences.english: The date paste is wrapped in the dough and baked in a pan in the oven.
sentences.chinese: 把枣泥酱包在面团里，然后用烤盘放进烤箱烤。

definition: piece of dough cut to the right size (for making jiaozi etc)
to let the dough rest (after mixing it)
maltose syrup/molasses/heavy (eyelids)/drowsy-eyed/listless/(of dough, candy etc) to soften/to become soft and sticky
to let the dough rest (after mixing it)
